name: Screx
description: Screx aims to provide a unified and intelligent environment for decentralized finance (DeFi), allowing users to manage their digital assets across multiple blockchains from a single point of control. The platform addresses the fragmentation and complexity of the current DeFi market by integrating essential tools and services into one seamless ecosystem. The core of Screx is an all-in-one DeFi toolkit that includes swaps, bridging, lending, staking, yield farming, and more. These features are designed to be fully interoperable, enabling assets to move instantly between them. The platform is built to operate across major EVM-compatible blockchains, such as Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, and Avalanche, using smart routing to find the most efficient transaction paths.
